00089                 {
00090                         $this->dieUsage("The method must be specified", 'param_method');
00091                 }elseif ($__title == '') {
00092                         $this->dieUsage("The title must be specified", 'param_title');
00093                 }elseif ($__method == "getElements") {
00094                         $data = $this->getElements($__username, $__pwd, $__uid, $__loginToken, $__editToken, $__title, $__revisionID);

00096                         $data = $this->getTemplates($__username, $__pwd, $__uid, $__loginToken, $__editToken, $__title, $__revisionID);

00110                 elseif ($__method == "getCategoryByName") {

00112                 }

00120                         return;

00124                 $result = $this->getResult();

00184         protected function getElements($username=NULL, $password=NULL, $id=NULL, $loginToken = NULL, $editToken = NULL, $title= NULL, $revisionID = NULL){
00185                 $__pcpServer = new PCPServer();
00186                 $__userCredentials = new PCPUserCredentials($username, $password, $id, $loginToken, $editToken);
00187                 $__pcpServer->login($__userCredentials);
00188                 $__pcpPage = $__pcpServer->readPage($__userCredentials,$title, $revisionID);
00189                 $__pom = new POMPage($__pcpPage->titel, $__pcpPage->text);
00190                 $__result = array();
00191                 $__elementsIterator = $__pom->getElements()->listIterator();
00192                 $__result["page"] = $this->toArray ($__pcpPage);
00193                 $__cnt = 0;
00194                 while($__elementsIterator->hasNext()){
00195                         $__element = &$__elementsIterator->getNextNodeValueByReference();
00196                         $__array = $this->toArray($__element);
00197                         $__result["page"][get_class($__element)][$__cnt] = $__array;
00198                         $__cnt++;
00199                 }
00200                 $result = $this->getResult();
00201                 $result->setIndexedTagName_recursive($__result, 'el');
00202                 $result->addValue(null, $this->getModuleName(), $__result);
00203         }

00309         private function toArray($data)
00310         {
00311                 if(is_array($data) || is_object($data))
00312                 {
00313                         if(get_class($data) =='POMPage'){
00314                                 $__pom = new POMPage($data->titel, $data->text);
00315                                 $__result = array();
00316                                 $__elementsIterator = $__pom->getElements()->listIterator();
00317                                 $__result["page"] = $this->toArray ($__pcpPage);
00318                                 $__cnt = 0;
00319                                 while($__elementsIterator->hasNext()){
00320                                         $__element = &$__elementsIterator->getNextNodeValueByReference();
00321                                         $__array = $this->toArray($__element);
00322                                         $__result["page"][get_class($__element)][$__cnt] = $__array;
00323                                         $__cnt++;
00324                                 }
00325                                 return $__result;
00326                         }
00327                         $__result = array();
00328 
00329                         foreach ($data as $__key => $__value)
00330                         {
00331                                 $__result[$__key] = $this->toArray($__value);
00332                         }
00333                         return $__result;
00334                 }
00335                 return $data;
00336         }
